citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:22 am on
24-APR-19.
Upon arriving at facility, the inspector called and left a voicemail for the listed telephone number in our database as
well as knocked on the door. The inspector waited for 30 minutes then left a business card at the door and left the
premises.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:22 am on
24-APR-19.
Upon arriving at facility, the inspector called and left a voicemail for the listed telephone number in our database as
well as knocked on the door.  The inspector waited for 30 minutes then left a business card at the door and left the
premises.
